solution_line_template: He spent an extra {new_card_cost}-{old_card_sale_price}=${<<{new_card_cost}-{old_card_sale_price}={extra_spent_on_card}>>}{extra_spent_on_card} on the video card
That means the total cost was {initial_pc_cost}+{extra_spent_on_card}=${<<{initial_pc_cost}+{extra_spent_on_card}={total_cost}>>}{total_cost}
